title: Meet the real Workington man: the voter demographic Conservatives hope are going to propel them to victory
text:
Bill Pennington is 69 years old and has voted Labour all his life. But on Dec 12 he will do the previously unthinkable and walk into his nearest polling booth in the Cumbrian town of Workington and put a cross in the box marked Conservative.

“I am voting for Boris Johnson because he supports the right things,” says Pennington, a retired job centre worker. “He realises the country voted to leave the EU and he is a character – I think we need more characters.”

Meet ‘Workington Man’: the new voter demographic the Conservatives hope are going to propel them to victory in the upcoming general election by displacing Labour in what previously would have been considered the least likely of places.

...
description: Bill Pennington is 69 years old and has voted Labour all his life.
